# ServiceProviderAsyncExtensions.GetRequiredServiceAsync&lt;T&gt; method

```csharp
public static Task<T> GetRequiredServiceAsync<T>(this IServiceProvider serviceProvider)
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
